simplifiedChinese.title: Concerning the Resurrection & Generosity
simplifiedChinese.Question1: What stands out to you in this passage?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: What truths do you gain about the character of God?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: What truths do you gain about men and women?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: What changes are you motivated to make in light of this passage?
